You come to understand the peculiar landscapetwo different lords ameer have decreed different tax rates for logging, and forests to the left belong to the lord ameer with the higher tax rates. In order to pay less taxes, people tend to go to the right side.
[Obtain 18-23 Wood]

choice_wood_leave.title: That's weird as hell, better leave

choice_stone_1.title: So tasty!
choice_stone_1.description:
They are very happy when you mention how delicious the fruit is.
[Obtain 11-13 Stone]

choice_iron_1.title: Help them procrastinate
choice_iron_1.description:
You reach out to take some of their building materials, and the workers carry on drinking and ignoring your presence.
 [Obtain 3-4 Iron Ore]

choice_water_1.title: It feels damp right here!
choice_water_1.description:
You rush to fetch your tools, all you have to do is to dig out the channel and draw out this precious water!
[Obtain 8-10 Fresh Water]

choice_water_leave.title: It's a waste of time, we still have enough water

choice_crab_1.title: Accept it gratefully
choice_crab_1.description:
It's a Cragpincer! Some in the tribe love to eat it, while others think it looks like a frighteningly huge bug and adamantly refuse to try it.
[Obtain 5-8 Crab Legs]

choice_venison_1.title: Chat with them
choice_venison_1.description:
Seeing you approach them, the excited young men begin to tear open their catch and even try to put the meat in your hands. Before you can even react, they resume arguing with each other about how they caught it together, so who should be the Chief now? After a few rounds of uninterruptable squabbling, they begin to compare the thickness of their tails and decide to use that to judge the winner.
[Obtain 3-4 Puffball Tenderloin]

choice_beef_1.title: Have a good laugh together
choice_beef_1.description:
The old man is very happy, and pulls you in for another joke.
[Obtain 2-3 Leg Meat]

choice_beef_leave.title: Worry the Lord Ameer will hear

choice_wheat_1.title: Marvel at their whimsical fantasy
choice_wheat_1.description:
They are very happy, and bring you along to look at something exotic.
[Obtain 5-8 Rice]

choice_gold_1.title: Looks pretty lucrative, let's try it too
choice_gold_1.description:
Sensing the presence of outsiders, the few people leading the group begin to talk in hushed tones. It turns out the lords ameer set two different tax rates for livestock and agriculture, and by selling these normal plants as hemostatic herbs, the merchants could increase their profits.
 [Obtain 5-15 Crude Gold]

choice_business2_1.title: We have too much Puffball Tenderloin

choice_business2_2.title: We have too much Leg Meat

choice_prop1_1.title: Approach him enthusiastically for a chat
choice_prop1_1.description:
The young man introduces himself, he is indeed a young official following the ideology of the King of Kings, and has come to these remote towns to try introducing some foreign technologies to reform their means of production, so that the entire country can find a new way of life. But after several years of toil, he has seen no hope of success, only all the failures of his comrades. Only a few of the numerous districts and towns were willing to accept their ideas.
He seems to be piqued by your interest in what was inside his package and barters a price with you.
[Spend 5 Crude Gold and obtain 1 Higher Quality Tactical Prop]

choice_prop1_2.title: Make some casual conversation
choice_prop1_2.description:
The young man introduces himself, he is indeed a young official following the ideology of the King of Kings, and has come to these remote towns to introduce some foreign technologies to reform their means of production, so that the entire country can find a new way of life. But after several years of toil, he has seen no hope of success, only all the failures of his comrades. Only a few of the numerous districts and towns were willing to accept their ideas.
He seems to be piqued by your apathy to his plight and interest in what was inside his package, and randomly hands you one of his tools.
[Obtain 1 Normal Tactical Prop]

choice_prop2_1.title: Walk towards the rich-looking merchant
choice_prop2_1.description: [Spend 50 Crude Gold to buy 1 Higher Quality Construct]

choice_cowboy1_1.title: Let's give them some Rice
choice_cowboy1_1.description:
He sees you retrieving some Rice and refuses to accept it with great trepidation, and only after several refusals did he offer some meat in exchange. From conversing with him you learn that he came here to look for a doctor for his sick grandson, for conditions back home were so bad that most rely on luck to survive, and that Rice is extremely precious. You had no idea it could be this bad in Sargon, and the old man sighs, recounting in a few words his local lord's muddle-headedness, and then walks off in the direction of a city. Hopefully he could find a doctor there. 
[Spend 10 Rice and obtain 4 Leg Meat]

choice_cowboy1_2.title: Let's give them some money
choice_cowboy1_2.description:
He sees you retrieving some Crude Gold and refuses to accept it with great trepidation, and only after several refusals did he offer some meat in exchange. From conversing with him you learn that he came here to look for a doctor for his sick grandson, for conditions back home were so bad that most rely on luck to survive, and that Crude Gold is extremely precious. You had no idea it could be this bad in Sargon, and the old man sighs, recounting in a few words his local lord's muddle-headedness, and then walks off in the direction of a city. Hopefully he could find a doctor there. 
[Spend 20 Crude Gold and obtain 4 Leg Meat]

choice_cowboy1_3.title: We know where to find a doctor!
choice_cowboy1_3.description: You point out the direction of the town doctor's place, but the medical equipment over there was pretty basic. You take a glance at the child, doubtful that he could receive adequate treatment.

choice_cowboy2_1.title: Let's give them some Rice
choice_cowboy2_1.description:
He sees you retrieving some Rice and refuses to accept it with great trepidation, and only after several refusals did he offer some meat in exchange. From conversing with him you learn that he came here to look for a doctor for his sick grandson, for conditions back home were so bad that most rely on luck to survive, and that Rice is extremely precious. You had no idea it could be this bad in Sargon, and the old man sighs, recounting in a few words his local lord's muddle-headedness, and then walks off in the direction of a city. Hopefully he could find a doctor there. 
[Spend 10 Rice and obtain 8 Leg Meat]

choice_cowboy2_2.title: Let's give them some money
choice_cowboy2_2.description:
He sees you retrieving some Crude Gold and refuses to accept it with great trepidation, and only after several refusals did he offer some meat in exchange. From conversing with him you learn that he came here to look for a doctor for his sick grandson, for conditions back home were so bad that most rely on luck to survive, and that Crude Gold is extremely precious. You had no idea it could be this bad in Sargon, and the old man sighs, recounting in a few words his local lord's muddle-headedness, and then walks off in the direction of a city. Hopefully he could find a doctor there. 
[Spend 20 Crude Gold and obtain 8 Leg Meat]

choice_cowboy2_3.title: Have we... met before?
choice_cowboy2_3.description:
You exchange looks with each other and finally remember the encounter from a few days ago. The child on his back is still coughing, and he still has to go to the next city to look for a doctor. He is very grateful for your help from back then, and takes out the meat he had on him and presents it as a thank you present. Looking at the meat, you have some mixed feelings. Hopefully he finds his doctor. 
[Obtain 4 Leg Meat]

choice_scout_1.title: Ask what the others are selling
choice_scout_1.description:
They are selling a new kind of Monitoring Tower, but after a few demonstrations they're interested in what you have instead... huh?
[Consume 1 Monitoring Tower II, reveal all undiscovered Zones within 2 spaces]

choice_scout_2.title: Ask what the guard is selling
choice_scout_2.description:
What the... who knew they wouldn't care in the slightest, and they even threw something at you. This is really useful! Why not pick it up? 
[Obtain 1 Monitoring Tower II]

choice_scout_leave.title: A lord ameer's soldiers? Best to keep away

choice_hungryman_1.title: Help her
choice_hungryman_1.description:
The lady eats the food you gave her, and energetically studies the map again. 
[Consume 1 random Provision, reveal 1 Undiscovered Zone]

choice_hungryman_2.title: Approach for a chat
choice_hungryman_2.description:
The lady happily tells you about the ancient gold coins she found on the way here, each with a beautiful story behind it. Her favorite one has a little girl engraved on it, sleeping soundly while surrounded with roses and wine. Its said that it was a gift from a father to his daughter when she was one-month old. You raise your eyebrows in wonder. 
 [Obtain 20 Crude Gold]

choice_hungryman_leave.title: Turn and leave
choice_hungryman_leave.description: Our own matters are more important

choice_who1_1.title: Go in for a look
choice_who1_1.description: It seems cool inside, let's go in.

choice_who1_2.title: For the gold, for the treasure hunter!
choice_who1_2.description: There's so many maps here, what exactly was she looking for...?

choice_who2_1.title: Go in for a look
choice_who2_1.description: It seems cool inside, let's go in.

choice_who2_2.title: Dig through a small pile of sand
choice_who2_2.description:
The young man does not even look at what was dug up. You hesitate on whether to pay him for grabbing it.
[Spend 2 Crude Gold and Obtain 1 random Tactical Prop]

choice_who2_3.title: Dig through a big pile of sand
choice_who2_3.description:
'Who threw the food in...'
'You can preserve food in this way too...?'
You hesitate on whether to pay him for grabbing the food.
[Spend 1 Crude Gold and obtain 1 random Provision]

choice_who2_4.title: Dig through the biggest pile of sand
choice_who2_4.description:
The young man cheers up! He says he didn't think such a large structure could be successfully moved through quicksand... it's a breakthrough discovery!
You hesitate on whether to pay him for taking the construct.
[Spend 6 Crude Gold and obtain 1 random Construct]

choice_who2_5.title: Dig through a small pile of sand
choice_who2_5.description:
The young man is not satisfied, and it looks like he hoped you would take the bulkier stuff.
While you dawdle, the young man behind you suddenly lets out a yell, and you think he suddenly realized the amount you paid him was not enough, but from the expletives that followed, it seems that it was because the sand had stopped flowing.
How could this be, didn't he find out in his research that it could be unpredictable? You cannot help but to wonder again if he would make a good official in the future.
[Spend 2 Crude Gold and obtain 1 random Tool]

choice_who2_6.title: Dig through a big pile of sand
choice_who2_6.description:
The young man's stomach growls, but he accepts the Crude Gold you offered.
While you dawdle, the young man behind you suddenly lets out a yell, and you think he suddenly realized the amount you paid him was not enough, but from the expletives that followed, it seems that it was because the sand had stopped flowing.
How could this be, didn't he find out in his research that it could be unpredictable? You cannot help but to wonder again if he would make a good official in the future.
[Spend 1 Crude Gold and obtain 1 random Provision]

choice_who2_7.title: Dig through the biggest pile of sand
choice_who2_7.description:
The young man no longer has the same joy as before, but is very satisfied with you taking away the bulkiest thing.
While you dawdle, the young man behind you suddenly lets out a yell, and you think he suddenly realized the amount you paid him was not enough, but from the expletives that followed, it seems that it was because the sand had stopped flowing.
How could this be, didn't he find out in his research that it could be unpredictable? You cannot help but to wonder again if he would make a good official in the future.
[Spend 6 Crude Gold and obtain 1 random Construct]

choice_who3_1.title: Go in for a look
choice_who3_1.description: It seems cool inside, let's go in.

choice_who3_2.title: Carefully offer your condolences
choice_who3_2.description:
She straightens her back just like her father did, and following the notes and maps left behind, bids you goodbye and heads towards her next destination.
This time, she clearly knows where she was going.
[Obtain Token <Surveying Machine>]

choice_who3_3.title: Leave quietly
choice_who3_3.description: We should let her handle this herself.

choice_who4_1.title: Go in for a look
choice_who4_1.description: It seems cool inside, let's go in.

choice_who4_2.title: How peculiar, let's just rest here
choice_who4_2.description:
A comrade fumbles with his own bag, and says someone must have stolen all the ingredients he had inside! Nobody in this tribe would ever do such a thing, so could it be that figure you saw earlier?
 [Lose 8 Rice]

choice_who4_3.title: How peculiar, let's press on
choice_who4_3.description: What else could be down there?

choice_who4_4.title: It seems dangerous, let's turn back
choice_who4_4.description:
A comrade who headed in the other direction in shock and fear got another jump scare: his bag was cut by something, and someone stole all the spoils from the hunt earlier! Nobody in this tribe would ever do such a thing, so could it be that figure you saw earlier? 
[Lose 3 Puffball Tenderloin]

choice_who4_5.title: How peculiar, let's press on
choice_who4_5.description: What else could be down there?

choice_who4_6.title: It seems dangerous, let's turn back
choice_who4_6.description:
There was no figure to be found except for a pack of small beasts, and you lose some of your food. A few brave miners say they want to return here later to check out the ore, and perhaps they might be valuable enough to compensate your lost food.
 [Lose 6 Crab Legs]

choice_who4_7.title: I don't get it, it's so scary!
choice_who4_7.description: Let's hurry home! A few brave expert miners say that they will return here for an investigation to deduce what type of ore veins these are, so just let them be!

choice_chef_1.title: Did you bring anything?
choice_chef_1.description: The group of miners reluctantly take out a bag, and they seem very concerned with it.

choice_chef_leave.title: How terrible, let's just head back to rest
choice_chef_leave.description: The frightened miners walk away in shock, still clutching the bag tightly in their hands... shouldn't you have asked what they brought back?

choice_woodtrade_1.title: Let's see how we can help
choice_woodtrade_1.description: You still have a surplus of money and supplies.

choice_woodtrade_2.title: Sell them all our Wood
choice_woodtrade_2.description: [Trade all the Wood you have for 60 Crude Gold]

choice_woodtrade_leave.title: There is nothing we can do

choice_gate1_1.title: So scary! Just take it already!
choice_gate1_1.description:
He sees you handing out money, and extends his hand out to try and grab some.
'Papa has money now... hahaha, Papa is rich!!'
'Wait, hold on! ...Papa is coming home now, and will buy you something to eat!'
[Give away 10 Crude Gold]

choice_gate1_2.title: Not a coin! And don't even try to block our way!
choice_gate1_2.description: He sees your vicious looks, and suddenly sits on the floor and starts to cry, his speech slurring, and you have no idea what he's talking about, with only a few words making any sense, 'papa,' 'daughter,' 'buying a meal.'

choice_gate1_3.title: You think you can bully us?!
choice_gate1_3.description: You want a fight? It's on!

choice_gate1_leave.title: Stop looking at them, let's leave already!
choice_gate1_leave.description:
He seems to have seen something, and as if pretending you never existed, runs over with a smile.... it was a little girl! He fishes out a black piece of candy from his pocket and hands it over.
'Be a good girl and eat it, okay! If you eat this the pain will stop!...The Originium will fly away!'
The girl starts crying out of fright and he looked completely bewildered.

choice_gate2_1.title: We remember him! Let's give him some money
choice_gate2_1.description:
He sees you handing out money, and while smiling and jumping out reaches his hand out to try and grab the bright and shiny objects.
You ask around about him, and it seems like he has been here for many years, and his Oripathy has worsened so much that he will probably die soon. There is some discussion about who should take away his remains when it does happen.
[Give away 100 Crude Gold]

choice_gate2_2.title: Not a coin! And don't even try to block our way!
choice_gate2_2.description: You reject him harshly, and he suddenly sits on the floor and starts to cry, his speech slurring, and you have no idea what he's talking about, with only a few words making any sense, 'papa', 'daughter', 'buying a meal'.

choice_gate2_3.title: You think you can bully us?!
choice_gate2_3.description: You want a fight? It's on!

choice_gate2_leave.title: Stop looking at them, let's leave already!
choice_gate2_leave.description:
He seems to have seen something, and as if pretending you never existed, runs over with a smile.... it was a little girl! He fishes out a black piece of candy from his pocket and hands it over.
'Be a good girl and eat it, okay! If you eat this the pain will stop!...The Originium will fly away!'
The girl starts crying out of fright and he looked completely bewildered.

choice_gate3_1.title: He's still alive! Let's give him a bit more...
choice_gate3_1.description:
He sees you handing out money, and while smiling and jumping, reaches his hand out to try and grab the bright and shiny objects... but falls down to the ground only after a few steps, twitching a few times before ceasing to move altogether.
The crowd gathers around him, and upon realizing that he fainted, scatters in a panic while covering their noses and mouths.
You watch as he coughs violently and then gets up, unsteadily walking to who knows where.
[Give away 1000 Crude Gold]

choice_gate3_2.title: Not a coin! And don't even try to block our way!
choice_gate3_2.description: You reject him harshly, and he suddenly sits on the floor and starts to cry, his speech slurring, and you have no idea what he's talking about, with only a few words making any sense, 'papa', 'daughter', 'buying a meal'.

choice_gate3_3.title: You think you can bully us?!
choice_gate3_3.description: You want a fight? It's on!

choice_gate3_leave.title: Stop looking at them, let's leave already!
choice_gate3_leave.description:
He seems to have seen something, and as if pretending you never existed, runs over with a smile.... it was a little girl! He fishes out a black piece of candy from his pocket and hands it over.
'Be a good girl and eat it, okay! If you eat this the pain will stop!...The Originium will fly away!'
The girl starts crying out of fright and he looked completely bewildered.

choice_shower_1.title: Use plenty of water to flush the sand away
choice_shower_1.description:
You flush the sand away, revealing a huge gate in its entirety.
[Spend 20 Fresh Water]

choice_shower_2.title: Use a little water and dig the rest
choice_shower_2.description:
The sand was washed away by the water, but it only revealed more sand underneath.
 [Consume 5 Fresh Water]

choice_shower_3.title: Place some money down and cautiously wait
choice_shower_3.description:
A young man from your tribe had said this: If you're at a loss of what to do after arriving someplace new, just put down some mechanical parts, or some money if lacking said parts, and a Liberi with blue feathers, a big mouth and an extremely loud voice would show up to help you. He truly believed this would work, because it was a tale passed down from his grandfather's grandfather's grandmother's grandfather.
[Give away 80 Crude Gold]

choice_shower_5.title: Let's go, there's nothing here
choice_shower_5.description:
But his description was so bizarre. Could there really be a Liberi that looked like that?
[Obtain 10 Ingredients]

choice_weathergod_1.title: Pick up the luggage he left behind
choice_weathergod_1.description:
You spot the luggage he threw to the ground, perhaps you could find something useful inside. That person merely looks at you, and you can see no emotion in his eyes.
[Obtain 2 random Provisions]

choice_weathergod_2.title: He deserves respect for his decision
choice_weathergod_2.description:
You take out some food and try to place it in his hands. The dying poet does not react, and carries on in silence.
[Obtain 2 random Provisions]

choice_weathergod_3.title: Leave
choice_weathergod_3.description: The weather conditions are unpredictable, it seems like your luck is faring too well.

choice_weathergod_4.title: Leave
choice_weathergod_4.description: The weather conditions are unpredictable, it seems like your luck is pretty good

choice_weathergod_leave.title: We can only wish him a safe journey
choice_weathergod_leave.description: Walk towards the dying poet silently

choice_fat_1.title: Do you know what Electrolyte Isotonic is?
choice_fat_1.description: The chef-looking person looks at you curiously.

choice_fat_2.title: You cooked some food? Let us have a taste!

choice_fat_3.title: We can sell you a little

choice_fat_4.title: We need to keep some water for ourselves!
choice_fat_4.description: The chef-looking person looks obviously dissatised, but he does not leave, and seems to have something to tell you.

choice_fat_5.title: We can sell you a bit more

choice_fat_6.title: We only have these to sell!

choice_fat_7.title: We need to keep some water for ourselves!
choice_fat_7.description: Let's go already! We can't give him any more!

choice_randomeat1_1.title: Chat with the lady
choice_randomeat1_1.description:
You have a nice chat with the lady, and she fishes out some food she had on her to share with you, which seems to be... hardtack?
[5 Random Operators replenish 2 Stamina]

choice_randomeat1_leave.title: Who cares
choice_randomeat1_leave.description: Our own matters are more important

choice_rob_1.title: Get our stuff back!
choice_rob_1.description: It is only natural to take back what belongs to you!

choice_direction_1.title: Look for where his footsteps end
choice_direction_1.description:
The children are not scared of him at all, and instead regard him as a sort of wooden statue, hanging some cloth strips on him, or lining up behind him. You gaze into his empty eyes, and curiosity drives you to the end of his footsteps.
[Reveal 1 undiscovered Zone]

choice_direction_2.title: See if he can still talk
choice_direction_2.description:
Perhaps he needs some assistance... you take out some Crude Gold and try to put it in his chest pocket. You also vaguely smell the dirt and sand on him as he remains silent with his empty eyes looking off into some unknown place far away.
[Spend 10 Crude Gold and reveal 2 Undiscovered Zones]

choice_direction_leave.title: Let's keep our distance
choice_direction_leave.description: He continues walking on forward slowly, no one knew where he was going, he had no relatives, no place to return to, and the last person who knew his name was also extremely old. The glory of the Zhayedan does not belong to him, nor the life of an ordinary person. He is left with only a shell, trudging on through the land of sand.

choice_fortune_2.title: Capitalize on the chaos and see what the others are doing
choice_fortune_2.description: People start shouting one after one another, and you try make out what exactly they are saying and it turns out to be praise for the Lord Ameer.

choice_fortune_3.title: Take a closer look
choice_fortune_3.description:
He's right there, and anyone can go. Many have secretly made their minds, and on the day you set off, they will also follow you discreetly to join the investigation.
[Reveal 1 Higher Quality undiscovered Zone]

choice_fortune_4.title: Take a closer look
choice_fortune_4.description:
You hear muffled laughter from behind, but just as you scan the crowd to see who laughed, everyone's expressions become respectful, just like the propagandists.
[Obtain Token <Surveying Machine>]

choice_fortune_5.title: Make a casual comment
choice_fortune_5.description:
Satisfied with everyone's reaction, the propagandist fishes out something from his pocket and throws it at the crowd of people.
[Obtain 2 Wood, 1 Stone, 10 Crude Gold]

choice_who5_1.title: Go in for a look
choice_who5_1.description: It seems cool inside, let's go in.

choice_who5_2.title: Put up a resistance
choice_who5_2.description: You sense from their angry insults that they have lost a land dispute, and can now only occupy one side of the barren land, which meant that they would receive less taxes, so they wanted to get their revenge by spraying excessive amounts of pesticide on each other's land to destroy their crops. You were taken to be someone sent from the other side, and they thought the dark thoughts they harbored were discovered, sending them into a fit of embarrassed rage.

choice_randomeat2_1.title: Seems like the northern Lord Ameer is better off
choice_randomeat2_1.description: Let's head northwards, and see what we'll run into.

choice_randomeat2_2.title: Seems like the southern Lord Ameer is better off
choice_randomeat2_2.description: Let's head southwards, and see what we'll run into.

choice_mwood_1.title: Send more people
choice_mwood_1.description: [Dispatch 4 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 2 Days, Obtain 30-40 Wood]

choice_mwood_2.title: Send less people
choice_mwood_2.description: [Dispatch 2 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 4 Days, Obtain 20-40 Wood]

choice_mwood_leave.title: Looks a little strange
choice_mwood_leave.description: In the evening when the heat subsids, and the forest dissipates with the sunset, and people keep looking in its direction until it is no longer visible. The old man in the tribe suddenly brings out a story of how when he was a child, an adult went to the ancient city that had suddenly appeared to look for treasures, but in the end he had only discovered how empty the place actually was.

choice_mstone_1.title: Send more people
choice_mstone_1.description: [Dispatch 4 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 2 Days, Obtain 15-20 Stone]

choice_mstone_2.title: Send less people
choice_mstone_2.description: [Dispatch 2 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 4 Days, Obtain 10-20 Stone]

choice_mstone_leave.title: Looks a little strange
choice_mstone_leave.description: In the evening when the heat subsids, and the mountains dissipate with the sunset, and people keep looking in their direction until they are no longer visible. The old man in the tribe suddenly brings out a story of how when he was a child, an adult went to the ancient city that had suddenly appeared to look for treasures, but in the end he had only discovered how empty the place actually was.

choice_miron_1.title: Send more people
choice_miron_1.description: [Dispatch 5 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 3 Days, Obtain 8-12 Iron Ore]

choice_miron_2.title: Send less people
choice_miron_2.description: [Dispatch 3 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 5 Days, Obtain 4-12 Iron Ore]

choice_miron_leave.title: Looks a little strange
choice_miron_leave.description: In the evening when the heat subsids, and the mine veins dissipate with the sunset, and people keep looking in their direction until they are no longer visible. The old man in the tribe suddenly brings out a story of how when he was a child, an adult went to the ancient city that had suddenly appeared to look for treasures, but in the end he had only discovered how empty the place actually was.

choice_mfoodmat1_1.title: Go towards the oasis
choice_mfoodmat1_1.description: [Dispatch 3 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 2 Days, Obtain 6-8 Puffball Tenderloin]

choice_mfoodmat1_2.title: Go towards the source of water
choice_mfoodmat1_2.description: [Dispatch 2 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 2 Days, Obtain 6-12 Crab Legs]

choice_mfoodmat2_1.title: Our first priority is to find something to eat!
choice_mfoodmat2_1.description: [Dispatch 4 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 3 Days, Obtain 4-7 Leg Meat]

choice_mfoodmat2_2.title: We're lost! Let's ask the nearby tribes for help
choice_mfoodmat2_2.description: [Dispatch 1 Operator, -1 Stamina each, Return after 3 Days, Obtain 6-12 Rice]

choice_mwater_1.title: Send more people and bring some water back
choice_mwater_1.description: [Dispatch 4 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 2 Days, Obtain 10-15 Fresh Water, Reveal 1 Undiscovered Zone]

choice_mwater_2.title: How scary, let's just get our water and go
choice_mwater_2.description: [Dispatch 2 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 1 Days, Obtain 5-10 Fresh Water]

choice_mspecial_1.title: Send some skilled individuals
choice_mspecial_1.description: [Dispatch 2 Specialist Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 2 Days, Reveal 2 Undiscovered High-Value Zones]

choice_mspecial_2.title: Why not just send a bunch of people
choice_mspecial_2.description: [Dispatch 5 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 2 Days, Reveal 2 Undiscovered Zones]

choice_mspecial_leave.title: We don't really need help right now

choice_mmedic_1.title: Our tribe has medical practitioners!
choice_mmedic_1.description: [Dispatch 2 Medic Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 2 Days, Obtain 3 Higher Quality Provisions]

choice_mmedic_2.title: We can only send a few people to check it out
choice_mmedic_2.description: [Dispatch 5 Operators, -1 Stamina each, Return after 2 Days, Obtain 3 Provisions]

choice_mpower_1.title: Follow the team with more veterans
choice_mpower_1.description: [Dispatch 1 Operator, -1 Stamina, Return after 5 Days, 6 Random Operators replenish 1 Stamina]

choice_mpower_2.title: Follow the team with more youths
choice_mpower_2.description: [Dispatch 1 Operator, -1 Stamina, Return after 2 Days, 3 Random Operators replenish 1 Stamina]

choice_maction_1.title: Dismantle the caravans and take a look
choice_maction_1.description:
You find a broken compass that the average person has no idea how to use, but the Infected are able to make it move, using it to find various supplies buried in the desert. You don't understand how Oripathy has granted them this ability, but they are happy to finally be able to somehow contribute to the tribe, though after using the compass each time they get extremely tired out.
[Dispatch 4 Operators, -3 Stamina each, after 2 Days, Obtain Token <Broken Compass>]

choice_maction_2.title: Just rummage around
choice_maction_2.description:
Your flipping of the Communications Terminal caused it to suddenly scream in a harsh tone: 'A woman and... Monster! Mons...' How noisy! Shut it up and quickly find whatever it is that you need.
[2 random Operators regain 3 stamina)

choice_main8a_1.title: We'll keep an eye on this
choice_main8a_1.description: Northward... what would you find there?

choice_main9a_1.title: We'll keep an eye on this
choice_main9a_1.description: Perhaps we might be able to catch a glimpse of the 'City of Gold' by looking at the information he gave us?

choice_main10a_1.title: We'll keep an eye on this
choice_main10a_1.description:
Perhaps we can later come across a way to decipher the text on it.
[Obtain persistent Token <Old Treasure Map>]

choice_main14b_1.title: Thank the 'Sand Soldier'
choice_main14b_1.description:
We need to seize this opportunity to restore the tribe's status.
[Obtain persistent Token <Reefsteep Ring>]

choice_main16b_1.title: We'll keep an eye on this

choice_main17b_1.title: We'll keep an eye on this
choice_main17b_1.description: What happened here? Where did the 'Sand Soldier' go? What should we do next?

choice_main20b_1.description: It's time for us to make a decision.

choice_mantic5_1.title: We need to return ASAP!
choice_mantic5_1.description: Those who invade our home can never be forgiven.

choice_mantic7_1.title: Is this the right decision?
choice_mantic7_1.description: As we look at our comrades rebuilding our homes, everyone has the same kind of doubt in their hearts.

choice_mantic8_1.title: We got it
choice_mantic8_1.description: We shouldn't treat the innocent with injustice!

choice_trademan2_1.title: Let's just do as we agreed earlier

choice_trademan5_1.title: We have no clue about this
choice_trademan5_1.description: Then who hired us? What exactly was that deal the other day? And where did the Liaison go?

mission_mwater_more.desc: Obtain 10-15 Fresh Water, Reveal 1 Undiscovered Zone

templateDesc: <color=#B99A56FF>{0}</color> in {1} Zone seems to have something to tell you
<color=#d8d974>{0}</color> sampled some of the food cooked at the Overnight Canteen, and replenished <color=#d8d974>{1}</color> Stamina
<color=#d8d974>{0}</color> was invited to the Overnight Canteen while passing by, and replenished <color=#d8d974>{1}</color> Stamina
<color=#d8d974>{0}</color> reminded everyone at the Overnight Canteen on fire safety, and replenished <color=#d8d974>{1}</color> Stamina

sandbox_0_food_34.description: When skill is used, other Operators that have eaten this food recover 2 SP.

sandbox_0_craft_10.description: Sand Soldier's token; all Operators ATK +5%

sandbox_tech_deployview.description: Operators gain visibility in the surrounding 8 tiles after deployment

sandbox_tech_showenemy.description: When your unit is attacked, reveal the attacker for 20s

sandbox_0_staminapot.itemUsage: A can that holds a lot of Stamina.
sandbox_0_staminapot.itemDesc: A can that holds a lot of Stamina.

sandbox_0_gold.itemUsage: Unprocessed Pure Gold, low in value or circulation.
sandbox_0_gold.itemDesc: Here, though, it is all that glitters.

sandbox_0_sundry.itemUsage: All drops others than fixed drops.
sandbox_0_sundry.itemDesc: All drops others than fixed drops.

sandbox_0_goodsundry.itemUsage: All drops others than fixed drops.
sandbox_0_goodsundry.itemDesc: All drops others than fixed drops.

sandbox_0_wood.itemUsage: Basic construct material widely used in the construction of constructs.
sandbox_0_wood.itemDesc: Do not use as firewood without thoroughly drying it out, unless you want to cover half the sky in smoke.

sandbox_0_stone.itemUsage: Common construct material widely used in the construction of constructs.
sandbox_0_stone.itemDesc: Be careful not to sprain your back when carrying it.

sandbox_0_iron.itemUsage: High-strength construct material widely used in the construction of advanced constructs.
sandbox_0_iron.itemDesc: Observe proper precautions against airborne particles and harmful gases when mining.

sandbox_0_crab.itemUsage: Ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting.
sandbox_0_crab.itemDesc: Cragpincers are delicious, far more desirable than sandworms.

sandbox_0_venison.itemUsage: Ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting.
sandbox_0_venison.itemDesc: Juicy and tender meat goes well with many different types of ingredients.

sandbox_0_beef.itemUsage: Ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting.
sandbox_0_beef.itemDesc: Leg meat attached to a big bone, with a naturally herb-like aroma.

sandbox_0_supermeat.itemUsage: Rare ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting rare animals.
sandbox_0_supermeat.itemDesc: It is highly sought-after by premium restaurants for its silky texture and rich taste.

sandbox_0_water.itemUsage: Required for survival and development. Can be collected by placing 'Crabbie Pumpies' at 'Clear Water.'
sandbox_0_water.itemDesc: Can be used as drinking water once purified, or used for facilities.

sandbox_0_egg.itemUsage: Ingredient commonly found in the wild.
sandbox_0_egg.itemDesc: Nutritious and easy to obtain, a popular food.

sandbox_0_mushroom.itemDesc: A great choice to add some flavor to a dish. Just be careful of poisonous mushrooms.

sandbox_0_peper.itemDesc: Chili pepper with a kick. Be careful of extra-spicy ones mixed within.

sandbox_0_sugar.itemDesc: A plant with sweet juices, named because its use as a seasoning was pioneered by the Sarkaz.

sandbox_0_horn.itemUsage: Rare ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting rare animals.
sandbox_0_horn.itemDesc: Just a little bit of it will add its unique aroma to the dish.

sandbox_0_food_1.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: Max HP +10%
sandbox_0_food_1.itemDesc:
Simple, ready-to-eat seasoned food, making it reasonably palatable.
The original, unseasoned version was so disagreeable that it was classified as a dietary supplement rather than food.

sandbox_0_food_2.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: Max HP +15%
sandbox_0_food_2.itemDesc:
Mixed grain with granite grab meat added for a savory touch.
Cragpincers are tasty, but who was the first to try one?

sandbox_0_food_3.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: Deployment Cost -2, ASPD +4
sandbox_0_food_3.itemDesc:
Traditional Sargonian dish with tasty meat filling. A local favorite.
Bigger is better.

sandbox_0_food_4.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: ATK +10%
sandbox_0_food_4.itemDesc:
Every country has its own ways of dining, and one is free to mix and match.
One would be well-advised not to try to put xiaolongbaos in wraps, or risk starting a riot.

sandbox_0_food_5.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: DEF +15%
sandbox_0_food_5.itemDesc:
Grains steamed in a crab shell, a regular sight on dinner tables in Sargon's rural areas.
Those in the nomadic cities sometimes try some and find pride in Sargon's unique cuisine, but few among the tribes would agree with them.

sandbox_0_food_6.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: Deployment Cost -2, DEF +6%
sandbox_0_food_6.itemDesc:
Made with whatever meat the hunter caught today.
The size of the wrap is a symbol of the hunter's skill, though some secretly stuff more grains in to make it bigger.

sandbox_0_food_7.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: ATK +12%
sandbox_0_food_7.itemDesc:
Made with a variety of different meats, offering a myriad of colors and flavors.
Part of the fun is digging through the rice to find your favorite meat.

sandbox_0_food_8.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: Deployment Cost -4
sandbox_0_food_8.itemDesc:
The meat has been smoked to give it a rich pine aroma.
Put a few slices on hot, steaming rice, and the scent of smoked meat fills the whole room.

sandbox_0_food_9.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: Block +1
sandbox_0_food_9.itemDesc:
All it takes is a few cuts and a quick rinse.
A controversial dish. Some claim to feel like they grew a shell like a cragpincer after eating it, which may or may not be an allergic reaction.

sandbox_0_food_10.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: ATK +10%, ASPD +10
sandbox_0_food_10.itemDesc:
Ready-to-eat meat and grains, prepared at low temperatures to ensure freshness.
Just heat and enjoy. The wonders of science!

sandbox_0_food_11.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: ATK +20%
sandbox_0_food_11.itemDesc:
Machine-cooled as soon as it has been cooked, offering a wonderful texture that is frozen on the outside but still warm on the inside.
Can also be enjoyed without cooling.

sandbox_0_food_12.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: RES +20
sandbox_0_food_12.itemDesc:
Extremely rich soup made by cooking under pressure for an extended period, made into solid stock.
Rich and flavorful, yet melts in the mouth, as though you are eating a piece of cloud.

sandbox_0_food_13.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: ATK +15%, DEF +15%
sandbox_0_food_13.itemDesc:
Cooked at a low temperature, then lightly grilled for flavor.
It is difficult to tell what beast it came from, but it hardly matters as long as it is tasty and filling.

sandbox_0_food_14.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: Deployment Cost -6
sandbox_0_food_14.itemDesc:
Drying is one of the oldest and simplest ways to preserve food.
A few small pieces hold a lot of calories, plenty to fill you up.

sandbox_0_food_15.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: ASPD +20
sandbox_0_food_15.itemDesc:
Meat sauce made from a variety of meats, with added nutrients, coloring, and flavoring.
It never expires thanks to the wonder of technology.

sandbox_0_food_16.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: Deployment Cost -8
sandbox_0_food_16.itemDesc:
Tear open the package to find savory salted meat within.
Making good jerky requires just the right mix of temperature and humidity, but the upside is that it can be kept for years. The only problem is the toughness...

sandbox_0_food_17.itemUsage: Gives Operator bonus when eaten: Redeployment Time -20%
sandbox_0_food_17.itemDesc:
Paired with mixed grains and nothing else, in order to keep the spotlight on the taste of the original ingredients.
Low-fiber, high-calorie, and filling, modern nomadic city supermarkets never stock it, but it is a popular product for small shops in the wilderness.

sandbox_0_food_18.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: ATK +25%
sandbox_0_food_18.itemDesc:
The culmination of developments in food technology, and the symbol of the modernization of food.
Food science products like these are key to feeling sated and getting the right amount of calories in a short time.

sandbox_0_food_19.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: Deployment Cost -8, ATK +10%
sandbox_0_food_19.itemDesc:
The nutrients that the human body needs have been extracted from meat and distilled into a cube.
Unfortunately, its appearance is just as unappetizing as the name.

sandbox_0_food_20.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: ASPD +15
sandbox_0_food_20.itemDesc:
Highly concentrated essence of the flavor and nutrition of meat.
Do not directly consume this concentrated solution, even if you live near a hospital.

sandbox_0_food_21.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: ATK +30%
sandbox_0_food_21.itemDesc:
Gel that retains consistency under room temperature and can be eaten directly. Soft, chewy, and very nutritious.
A good example of how high-tech food has lost its original flavor.

sandbox_0_food_22.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: Block +1, DEF +40%
sandbox_0_food_22.itemDesc:
Premium meat has been added to emphasize the flavor and nutritious value of cragpincer.
A little-known fact is that it also tries to emulate the texture of cragpincer.

sandbox_0_food_23.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: Max HP +40%, Redeployment Time -30%
sandbox_0_food_23.itemDesc:
Comprised of protein, fat, and carbohydrates according to the needs of the human body. Easy to make and carry.
Often carried by explorers.

sandbox_0_food_24.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: ATK +20%, ASPD +15
sandbox_0_food_24.itemDesc:
The Essence of Savor was invented by a chef who had lost his sense of taste. His secret joy was observing his customers' smiles to determine whether they enjoyed his food.
A heartwarming story to everyone except his apprentices who have to taste-taste his new creations.

sandbox_0_food_25.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: Max HP +60%, Block +2
sandbox_0_food_25.itemDesc:
A small piece gives you enough energy to last the day.
Be careful about mixing them with sugar cubes. Accidental ingestion will not cause any immediate harm, but that is a LOT of calories you are taking in.

sandbox_0_food_26.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: Skill SP cost -30%, Redeployment Time -30%
sandbox_0_food_26.itemDesc:
Food granules made with an appealing appearance to make the eater happy.
People trying to satiate their hunger and quickly get their energy boost, however, seldom notice.

sandbox_0_food_27.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: ATK +20%, Block +1
sandbox_0_food_27.itemDesc:
An ocean of aroma and flavor in every mouthful.
Leithanians pair different music with different kinds of soup, even writing poems to the soup of the day.

sandbox_0_food_28.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: Deployment Cost -18
sandbox_0_food_28.itemDesc:
Proper table manners are critical to ensuring a proper dining experience.
Victorians are proud of their culture, never bowing their heads to anyone.

sandbox_0_food_29.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: ASPD +35
sandbox_0_food_29.itemDesc:
A Rhine Lab product that rearranges the molecular structure of food. The capsule is tasty and very filling, reducing food intake while maintaining the same amount of satisfaction.
Good for health, not so much for wellbeing.

sandbox_0_food_30.itemUsage: Gives Operator 1 Stamina and bonus when eaten: ATK +40%
sandbox_0_food_30.itemDesc:
A dream in the cloudy mountains.
Tea, wine, wind, snow, you can taste it all.

sandbox_0_food_31.itemUsage: Gives Operator 2 Stamina and bonus when eaten: Max HP +50%, DEF +50%
sandbox_0_food_31.itemDesc:
Made with fresh seasonal produce, delivering a treat for the eyes and conveying Zen through plating.
Higashinese chefs believe in achieving the best of both worlds in taste and appearance.

sandbox_0_food_32.itemUsage: Gives Operator 2 Stamina and bonus when eaten: Skill SP cost -40%
sandbox_0_food_32.itemDesc:
The color alone excites the mind and arouses the desire to have it, turning heads even if one has already passed it by.
A single sip fills you with energy. It has been in high demand due to rumors that the Radiant Knight drinks it.

sandbox_0_food_33.itemUsage: Gives Operator 2 Stamina and bonus when eaten: Redeployment Time -50%
sandbox_0_food_33.itemDesc:
The pure appearance is soothing, but the flavor creates strange mental images... of explosions?
And why is it so damn sweet?

sandbox_0_food_34.itemUsage: Gives Operator 2 Stamina and bonus when eaten: When a skill is used, other Operators who have eaten this food recover 2 SP.
sandbox_0_food_34.itemDesc:
Legend has it that a priest invented it after being inspired by an epic poem, in order to communicate what he felt.
Wait, there's alcohol in it! I'm getting dizzy already!

sandbox_0_food_35.itemUsage: Gives Operator 3 Stamina and bonus when eaten: Gain Camouflage, ATK +50%
sandbox_0_food_35.itemDesc:
Dancing around a fire, with a whole animal roasted over the fire as its skin becomes golden crispy and the fat seeps out of it. This is the highest honor given to guests of the jungle clans.
Finish the entire dish, and you will be the clan's hero for the day.

sandbox_0_building_1.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Produces <Rice> daily (up to 12 constructs of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_1.itemDesc:
Portable plating trough employing special soil suitable for growing various plants faster and more effectively.
Although crops planted this way have been demonstrated to be safe and healthy, many people remain unconvinced.

sandbox_0_building_2.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Allows you to combine <Fresh Water> and <Iron Ore> into <Crude Gold> (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_2.itemDesc:
A private metallurgy machine that enables the production of crude Pure Gold ingots.
Though less precious than Pure Gold, its value is still recognized in many places, such as among the mercenaries of the black market.

sandbox_0_building_3.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Allows you to combine <Fresh Water> and <Iron Ore> into more <Crude Gold> (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_3.itemDesc:
A private metallurgy machine that enables the production of crude Pure Gold ingots.
Though less precious than Pure Gold, its value is still recognized in many places, such as among the mercenaries of the black market.

sandbox_0_building_4.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Allows you to combine <Fresh Water> and <Iron Ore> into even more <Crude Gold> (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_4.itemDesc:
A private metallurgy machine that enables the production of crude Pure Gold ingots.
Though less precious than Pure Gold, its value is still recognized in many places, such as among the mercenaries of the black market.

sandbox_0_building_5.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Offers visibility in an area.
sandbox_0_building_5.itemDesc:
Temporary reconnaissance outpost. The lightened structures has led to doubts about its safety.
Fortunately, lookouts do not have to climb the tower themselves; the reconnaissance equipment at the top does almost all the work.

sandbox_0_building_6.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Offers visibility in an area. Range increased, reinforced, and gains Camouflage.
sandbox_0_building_6.itemDesc:
Temporary reconnaissance outpost. The lightened structures has led to doubts about its safety.
Fortunately, lookouts do not have to climb the tower themselves; the reconnaissance equipment at the top does almost all the work.

sandbox_0_building_7.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Offers visibility in an area. Range further increased, heavily-reinforced, and gains Camouflage.
sandbox_0_building_7.itemDesc:
Temporary reconnaissance outpost. The lightened structures has led to doubts about its safety.
Fortunately, lookouts do not have to climb the tower themselves; the reconnaissance equipment at the top does almost all the work.

sandbox_0_building_8.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Blocks the enemy's path, forcing them to go around it.
sandbox_0_building_8.itemDesc:
Transparent but rigid, just like the social distance and psychological defenses that city folk put between each other.
You're a nice person, but don't come any closer.

sandbox_0_building_9.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Blocks the enemy's path, forcing them to go around it. Reinforced and gains Camouflage.
sandbox_0_building_9.itemDesc:
Transparent but rigid, just like the social distance and psychological defenses that city folk put between each other.
You're a nice person, but don't come any closer.

sandbox_0_building_10.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Fortification that ranged Operators can be deployed on.
sandbox_0_building_10.itemDesc:
Defensive platform that allows one to look out for enemies and attack from high ground. Reinforced with Originium technology.
Offers sufficient protection to allow those on it to retreat when attacked.

sandbox_0_building_11.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Reinforced fortification that ranged Operators can be deployed on.
sandbox_0_building_11.itemDesc:
Defensive platform that allows one to look out for enemies and attack from high ground. Reinforced with Originium technology.
Offers sufficient protection to allow those on it to retreat when attacked.

sandbox_0_building_12.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Heavily-reinforced fortification that ranged Operators can be deployed on.
sandbox_0_building_12.itemDesc:
Defensive platform that allows one to look out for enemies and attack from high ground. Reinforced with Originium technology.
Offers sufficient protection to allow those on it to retreat when attacked.

sandbox_0_building_13.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Blocks the enemy, but does not change their path.
sandbox_0_building_13.itemDesc:
Tall construct used to block off roads.
Able to take a beating.

sandbox_0_building_14.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Blocks the enemy, but does not change their path. Reinforced.
sandbox_0_building_14.itemDesc:
Tall construct used to block off roads.
Able to take a beating.

sandbox_0_building_17.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Fires a net at the enemy in front, temporarily binding them.
sandbox_0_building_17.itemDesc:
Launcher that searches for enemies from above, firing nets that trap them.
The fire and blade-resistant nets once trapped its creator for an entire day.

sandbox_0_building_18.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Fires a net at the enemy in front, temporarily binding them for a longer period.
sandbox_0_building_18.itemDesc:
Launcher that searches for enemies from above, firing nets that trap them.
The fire and blade-resistant nets once trapped its creator for an entire day.

sandbox_0_building_19.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Pushes away the enemy in front.
sandbox_0_building_19.itemDesc:
Equipped with a can of compressed air that knocks the target back.
Does not deal damage to the target.

sandbox_0_building_20.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Pushes away the enemy in front with greater frequency.
sandbox_0_building_20.itemDesc:
Equipped with a can of compressed air that knocks the target back.
Does not deal damage to the target.

sandbox_0_building_21.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Unlocks Transregional communication after day 9 of each round (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_21.itemDesc:
Base station that enables contact with people from other plates, such as mercenary 'moving services.'
Perseverance is a virtue, but one would be well-advised to have a contingency plan.

sandbox_0_building_22.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Unlocks Transregional communication after day 6 of each round (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_22.itemDesc:
Base station that enables contact with people from other plates, such as mercenary 'moving services.'
Perseverance is a virtue, but one would be well-advised to have a contingency plan.

sandbox_0_building_23.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Gives an extra deployment slot each battle (up to 3 constructs of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_23.itemDesc:
Used to survey the surrounding area and reconfigure dispatch personnel, increasing squad flexibility.
There is strength in numbers.

sandbox_0_building_24.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Gives 2 extra deployment slots each battle (up to 3 constructs of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_24.itemDesc:
Used to survey the surrounding area and reconfigure dispatch personnel, increasing squad flexibility.
There is strength in numbers.

sandbox_0_building_25.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Gives 2 Life Points each battle (up to 5 constructs of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_25.itemDesc:
Used to survey the surrounding area and improve dispatch personnel condition, increasing squad capability.
A wealthy man once bought it in the belief that it would increase his lifespan. No one knows if he succeeded.

sandbox_0_building_26.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Gives 3 Life Points each battle (up to 5 constructs of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_26.itemDesc:
Used to survey the surrounding area and improve dispatch personnel condition, increasing squad capability.
A wealthy man once bought it in the belief that it would increase his lifespan. No one knows if he succeeded.

sandbox_0_building_27.itemUsage: Effect when placed: Gives extra Construction Points at the end of the round (up to 4 constructs of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_27.itemDesc:
Supercomputer that provides powerful computing and research capability.
Gives you a big boost in productivity.

sandbox_0_tactical_1.itemUsage: Effect when used: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemies.
sandbox_0_tactical_1.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to delay the enemy for a considerable time.

sandbox_0_tactical_2.itemUsage: Effect when used: When linked to other Support Coils, deals Arts damage by shocking passing enemies, and slows them.
sandbox_0_tactical_2.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to create a deadly high-voltage current between two devices.

sandbox_0_tactical_3.itemUsage: Effect when used: When activated, explodes when an enemy passes by, dealing True Damage to all nearby enemies, and temporarily increasing damage that they take.
sandbox_0_tactical_3.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to deal damage to the enemy.

sandbox_0_tactical_4.itemUsage: Effect when used: Pushes away nearby enemies with greater force.
sandbox_0_tactical_4.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to be deployed quickly to push away enemies.

sandbox_0_tactical_5.itemUsage: Effect when used: Explodes to deal heavy True Damage to all enemies within range.
sandbox_0_tactical_5.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, capable of dealing heavy damage and destroying Dirt Mound.

sandbox_0_tactical_6.itemUsage: Effect when used: Temporarily inflicts Sleep on enemies in the 8 surrounding tiles. Special effect on animals.
sandbox_0_tactical_6.itemDesc:
Originally used by hunters to put wild animals to sleep.
It has found use as a sleeping aid as well, though proper usage must be observed.

sandbox_0_tactical_7.itemUsage: Effect when used: Temporarily stuns nearby enemies.
sandbox_0_tactical_7.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to stun the enemy.

sandbox_0_tactical_8.itemUsage: Effect when used: Can be deployed on high and low ground. Grants Camouflage to all allies in the 8 surrounding tiles.
sandbox_0_tactical_8.itemDesc:
Sunvalley Industries equipment developed to investigate Acidic Originium Slug habitats, camouflaging the user while providing defensive support.
It will at least help you keep your clothes on in a corrosive environment.

sandbox_0_tactical_9.itemUsage: Effect when used: Increases the ASPD of the Operator in front, and forces them to retreat when the effect expires (partial DP refund).
sandbox_0_tactical_9.itemDesc:
Suspicious ingredients, strong side effects, missing date of production and expiry date, and smells really bad to boot.
It was originally branded 'Extreme Energy Awakening Potency Excitement Explosion,' but was forced to rebrand due to false advertising.

sandbox_0_tactical_10.itemUsage: Effect when used: Restores a large amount of HP to an ally within range.
sandbox_0_tactical_10.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to restore Operator health.

sandbox_0_tactical_11.itemUsage: Effect when used: Periodically restores SP to an ally.
sandbox_0_tactical_11.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, able to restore Operator SP.

sandbox_0_tactical_12.itemUsage: Effect when used: Immediately causes the Operator in front to retreat, with greatly reduced Redeployment Time.
sandbox_0_tactical_12.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands, enabling quick movement of Operators.

sandbox_0_tactical_13.itemUsage: Effect when used: Periodically provides Barrier for an ally.
sandbox_0_tactical_13.itemDesc:
A portable shield generator.
It has been modified to automatically provide protection without manual command.

sandbox_0_tactical_14.itemUsage: Effect when used: Can be deployed on high and low ground. Restores the HP of the construct in front every second.
sandbox_0_tactical_14.itemDesc:
Unmanned repair drone that automatically repairs damaged constructs.
It will automatically retreat once its set hours are up, staying away from danger.

sandbox_0_tactical_15.itemUsage: Effect when used: Allows <Fresh Water> to be gathered from <Clear Water>.
sandbox_0_tactical_15.itemDesc:
Highly-effective automatic pump. Just place it near a source of water.
The form was originally inspired by Metal Crabs, but was modified when wild Metal Crabs began seeing it as a rival.

sandbox_0_tactical_16.itemUsage: Effect when used: Produces <Gatherers> to gather from <Thickets>, <Monoliths>, and <Strange Ore Veins>, with a bonus when gathering from <Thickets>. Limit of 3.
sandbox_0_tactical_16.itemDesc:
Assembly machine developed by Sunvalley Industries.
Produces mechanical workers that gather certain resources, saving on manpower.

sandbox_0_tactical_17.itemUsage: Effect when used: Produces <Gatherers> to gather from <Thickets>, <Monoliths>, and <Strange Ore Veins>, with a bonus when gathering from <Monolith>. Limit of 3.
sandbox_0_tactical_17.itemDesc:
Improved assembly machine developed by Sunvalley Industries.
Produces improved mechanical workers that gather certain resources, saving on manpower.

sandbox_0_tactical_18.itemUsage: Effect when used: Produces <Gatherers> to gather from <Thickets>, <Monoliths>, and <Strange Ore Veins>, with a bonus when gathering from <Strange Ore Veins>. Limit of 4.
sandbox_0_tactical_18.itemDesc:
Advanced assembly machine developed by Sunvalley Industries.
Produces advanced mechanical workers that gather certain resources, saving on manpower. The newest model has an especially shiny paint job.

sandbox_0_tactical_19.itemUsage: Effect when used: Constructs a platform on the water upon which any unit can be deployed.
sandbox_0_tactical_19.itemDesc: Item discovered in the wastelands. Constructs a platform on the water upon which any unit can be deployed.

sandbox_0_craft_1.itemDesc:
Communications terminal sold in the Reefsteep Black Market.
Base station that enables contact with people from other plates, such as mercenary 'moving services.'

sandbox_0_craft_2.itemUsage: Detects historical remains and shows their location this round.
sandbox_0_craft_2.itemDesc:
Survey equipment sold in the Reefsteep Black Market.
Scans for abnormalities in geological composition. Who knows what lies beneath the surface, battered by the wind and sand?

sandbox_0_craft_3.itemUsage: Slightly reduces new enemies this round.
sandbox_0_craft_3.itemDesc:
An ancient flag that lies buried in the sand.
A relic from wars of days past. Hear the roaring of the war beasts and the blowing of the horn. The sands swallow it all, even the great armies of the Khagan.

sandbox_0_craft_4.itemUsage: +1 daily Act each day before Day 12.
sandbox_0_craft_4.itemDesc:
An ancient compass that is difficult for normal people to use, but those afflicted with the rock-sickness are able to use it to find supplies scattered in the sand.
Using the compass exhausts them, but they are glad to contribute to the clan.

sandbox_0_craft_5.itemUsage: Get the Treasure Hunter to identify it at the Black Market, and you may end up with something useful.
sandbox_0_craft_5.itemDesc:
A rock found in the ocean of sand.
Polished by the land and time, it leaves behind a little surprise for those who come after. Ask the Treasure Hunter what lies within.

sandbox_0_craft_6.itemUsage: Small chance to get extra food when stage is completed.
sandbox_0_craft_6.itemDesc:
A scratched crystal ball.
Old Isin says it reveals the threads of fate buried in the sands, but all you see is your own face.

sandbox_0_craft_7.itemUsage: Small chance to get extra Crude Gold when stage is completed.
sandbox_0_craft_7.itemDesc:
Treasure map found in an ancient desert ruin.
The poem on the back records the life of the writer, who lived a thousand years ago. He followed in the footsteps of the Khaganquest through the southern realms and to the other end of the world.

sandbox_0_craft_8.itemDesc:
A jeweled horn, tied to a broken flag.
Future generations piece together the scenes of bloodshed from fragments of records. The sound of the horn no longer represents the burning dream of the bonfire on the plains, only joy at discovering treasure.

sandbox_0_craft_9.itemUsage: Increased chance of encountering 'Sand Soldier' at the Black Market.
sandbox_0_craft_9.itemDesc:
An ancient Sargonian coin.
Man has bestowed value upon a thin piece of pressed metal. It has passed through many hands into yours, representing you.

sandbox_0_craft_10.itemDesc:
Ring engraved with the map of the Reefsteep area, marking certain points of interest.
Consider it recognition, or assistance; either way, the choice is no longer yours.

sandbox_0_craft_11.itemUsage: Reveal 3 more undiscovered zones at start
sandbox_0_craft_11.itemDesc:
The fallen crown of the Ibut Lord Ameer.
It clangs as it falls, just like everything else.

sandbox_0_craft_12.itemDesc:
Purple flowers that Manticore picked from the wild.
She says she has no name, only countless code names. She would like to have a name like these flowers though, if there ever comes a day when she settles down. What would it be?

sandbox_0_craft_13.itemUsage: Chance to get extra construct materials when stage is completed.
sandbox_0_craft_13.itemDesc:
A list of names.
'Sand Soldier' calls your clan partners, and this list a gift. The crossed-out names are vaguely familiar.

sandbox_0_craft_14.itemUsage: Liaison sells better items at the Black Market.
sandbox_0_craft_14.itemDesc:
Two business cards, one for Sunvalley Industries, one for the Liaison himself.
The way he addresses you has not changed, but there is a little more 'familiarity' in the smile behind those sunglasses.
